🔗 Connect #

Thank you for visiting my portfolio! I’m always open to connecting with like-minded professionals, collaborators, and organizations working at the intersection of healthcare and data science. Whether you’re interested in discussing opportunities, sharing insights, or working together on impactful healthcare projects—I’d love to hear from you.

📬 Contact Me #

  • 📧 Email: sadasivamharishkumar@gmail.com
  • 📞 Phone: +1 (972)-654-0333
  • 🌍 Location: Currently based in the United States

🌐 Social Profiles #

  • 💼 LinkedIn
  • 🐙 GitHub
  • 📝 Resume (PDF)

Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn or email. I’m happy to chat about health informatics, data analytics, AI in healthcare, or any innovative idea you have in mind.

💼 Experience #

Healthcare Data Analyst #

GTechnologies Pty Ltd – Aug 2024 – May 2025
Designed and led the development of an EMR system and clinical dashboards to improve hospital data visibility, patient record accuracy, and reporting efficiency.

  • Built a web-based EMR system using MySQL, React.js, and Node.js, improving clinical data accessibility by 60%.
  • Standardized medical documentation with ICD-11 coding in patient registration and pathology forms, boosting accuracy by 40%.
  • Developed and tested performance dashboards to monitor productivity, error rates, and medication record completeness.
  • Optimized EMR system performance by 50% by enhancing internal search logic and resolving front-end/backend integration issues.
  • Conducted QA and regression testing for EMR enhancements and participated in agile sprint planning to streamline releases.
  • Designed SQL-based dashboards for clinical and financial metrics, improving decision-making timelines by 40%.
  • Assisted in backend validation tasks and ensured compliance with documentation standards for audit readiness.

Research Data Analyst #

IU BioHealth Informatics Research Centre, Indiana University – Sep 2023 – May 2024
Supported population health studies and system-wide quality reporting through SQL analysis, predictive modeling, and data visualization.

📊 Projects #

AI-Enabled EMR System (Practicum Project) #

Technologies: MySQL, Node.js, React.js, Express.js, HTML, CSS, ICD-11

  • Led development of a dynamic Electronic Medical Records (EMR) platform integrating AI modules for clinical workflow optimization.
  • Built structured databases in MySQL, and connected them with interactive front-end forms for patient registration, search, and update using React.js and Node.js.
  • Enhanced search accuracy and user accessibility; enabled ICD-11-based documentation for standardization and interoperability.
  • Addressed key system challenges including plugin errors, password compatibility, and PID file issues—improving stability and usability of the EMR system.

Clinical Data Analysis of Hospital Readmissions and Patient Outcomes #

Technologies: Excel, SQL, Python (Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib), UCI Hospital Dataset
